synopsis.text:
Kagekidan Hanagumi, the Paris-based defense force, finds itself in a state of flux following the departure of their leader, Ohgami Ichirou, who has returned to Japan to resume command of the Teikoku Kagekidan Hanagumi. With no clear successor appointed, the talented members of the Paris Kagekidan are embroiled in a power struggle, each believing they possess the ideal qualities to lead the team.

Amidst the internal strife, a sinister threat emerges, casting a dark shadow over the city of Paris. As the frequency of mysterious attacks escalates, the girls must set aside their differences and unite to protect their city. Simultaneously, they must safeguard their secret identities as members of Les Chattes Noires, all while maintaining their roles as the best showgirls in town.

Can the Paris Kagekidan overcome their internal power struggle and choose a leader? Will they uncover the mastermind behind the attacks and preserve the sanctity of Paris? Only time will tell in this thrilling OVA that follows the events of Sakura Taisen 3.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
